   16: 
   17: -module(metrics_c2s_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: -define(WAIT_TIME, 100).
   24: 
   25: -import(metrics_helper, [assert_counter/2,
   26:                          get_counter_value/1]).
   27: 
   28: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: %% Suite configuration
   30: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   31: 
   32: all() ->
   33:     [{group, single},
   34:      {group, multiple},
   35:      {group, drop},
   36:      {group, errors},
   37:      {group, count}].
   38: 
   39: groups() ->
   40:     [{single, [sequence], [message_one,
   41:                            stanza_one,
   42:                            presence_one,
   43:                            presence_direct_one,
   44:                            iq_one]},
   45:      {multiple, [sequence], [messages]},
   46:      {drop, [sequence], [bounced
   47:                          ]},
   48:      {errors, [sequence], [error_total,
   49:                            error_mesg,
   50:                            error_iq,
   51:                            error_presence]},
   52:      {count, [sequence], [stanza_count]}].
   53: 
   54: suite() ->
   55:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}},
   56:      {require, ejabberd_node} | escalus:suite()].
   57: 
   58: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   59: %% Init & teardown
   60: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     Config1 = dynamic_modules:stop_running(mod_offline, Config),
   64:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config1).
   65: 
   66: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   67:     dynamic_modules:start_running(Config),
   68:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   69: 
   70: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   71:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   72: 
   73: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   74:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   75: 
   76: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   77:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   78: 
   79: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   80:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   81: 
   82: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   83: %% Message tests
   84: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   85: 
   86: 
   87: message_one(Config) ->
   88:     {value, MesgSent} = get_counter_value(xmppMessageSent),
   89:     {value, MesgReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppMessageReceived),
   90:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   91: 
   92:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
   93:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
   94: 
   95:         assert_counter(MesgSent + 1, xmppMessageSent),
   96:         assert_counter(MesgReceived + 1, xmppMessageReceived)
   97: 
   98:         end).
   99: 
  100: stanza_one(Config) ->
  101:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  102:         {value, StanzaSent} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaSent),
  103:         {value, StanzaReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaReceived),
  104: 
  105:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  106:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  107: 
  108:         assert_counter(StanzaSent + 1, xmppStanzaSent),
  109:         assert_counter(StanzaReceived + 1, xmppStanzaReceived)
  110: 
  111:         end).
  112: 
  113: presence_one(Config) ->
  114:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  115:         {value, PresenceSent} = get_counter_value(xmppPresenceSent),
  116:         {value, PresenceReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppPresenceReceived),
  117:         {value, StanzaSent} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaSent),
  118:         {value, StanzaReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaReceived),
  119: 
  120:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  121:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  122: 
  123:         assert_counter(PresenceSent + 1, xmppPresenceSent),
  124:         assert_counter(PresenceReceived + 1, xmppPresenceReceived),
  125:         assert_counter(StanzaSent + 1, xmppStanzaSent),
  126:         assert_counter(StanzaReceived + 1, xmppStanzaReceived)
  127: 
  128:         end).
  129: 
  130: presence_direct_one(Config) ->
  131:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  132:         {value, PresenceSent} = get_counter_value(xmppPresenceSent),
  133:         {value, PresenceReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppPresenceReceived),
  134:         {value, StanzaSent} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaSent),
  135:         {value, StanzaReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaReceived),
  136: 
  137:         Presence = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>),
  138:         escalus:send(Alice, Presence),
  139:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  140: 
  141:         assert_counter(PresenceSent + 1, xmppPresenceSent),
  142:         assert_counter(PresenceReceived + 1, xmppPresenceReceived),
  143:         assert_counter(StanzaSent + 1, xmppStanzaSent),
  144:         assert_counter(StanzaReceived + 1, xmppStanzaReceived)
  145: 
  146:         end).
  147: 
  148: iq_one(Config) ->
  149:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  150:         {value, IqSent} = get_counter_value(xmppIqSent),
  151:         {value, IqReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppIqReceived),
  152:         {value, StanzaSent} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaSent),
  153:         {value, StanzaReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaReceived),
  154: 
  155:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  156:                             escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  157:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  158: 
  159:         assert_counter(IqSent + 1, xmppIqSent),
  160:         assert_counter(StanzaSent + 1, xmppStanzaSent),
  161:         assert_counter(StanzaReceived + 1, xmppStanzaReceived),
  162:         assert_counter(IqReceived + 1, xmppIqReceived)
  163: 
  164:         end).
  165: 
  166: messages(Config) ->
  167:     {value, MesgSent} = get_counter_value(xmppMessageSent),
  168:     {value, MesgReceived} = get_counter_value(xmppMessageReceived),
  169:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  170: 
  171:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  172:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  173:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  174:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  175:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  176:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  177:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  178:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  179: 
  180:         assert_counter(MesgSent + 4, xmppMessageSent),
  181:         assert_counter(MesgReceived + 4, xmppMessageReceived)
  182: 
  183:         end).
  184: 
  185: bounced(Config) ->
  186:     {value, MesgBounced} = get_counter_value(xmppMessageBounced),
  187:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  188: 
  189:         escalus_client:stop(Bob),
  190:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  191: 
  192:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  193:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  194: 
  195:         assert_counter(MesgBounced + 1, xmppMessageBounced)
  196: 
  197:         end).
  198: 
  199: stanza_count(Config) ->
  200:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  201:         {value, OldStanzaCount} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaCount),
  202: 
  203:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  204:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  205:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  206:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  207:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  208:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  209:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi!">>)),
  210:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  211: 
  212:         {value, StanzaCount} = get_counter_value(xmppStanzaCount),
  213:         true = StanzaCount >= OldStanzaCount + 4
  214: 
  215:         end).
  216: 
  217: 
  218: %%-----------------------------------------------------
  219: %% Error tests
  220: %%-----------------------------------------------------
  221: 
  222: error_total(Config) ->
  223:     {value, Errors} = get_counter_value(xmppErrorTotal),
  224:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  225: 
  226:         escalus_client:stop(Bob),
  227:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  228: 
  229:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  230:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  231: 
  232:         assert_counter(Errors + 1, xmppErrorTotal)
  233: 
  234:         end).
  235: 
  236: error_mesg(Config) ->
  237:     {value, Errors} = get_counter_value(xmppErrorMessage),
  238:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  239: 
  240:         escalus_client:stop(Bob),
  241:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  242: 
  243:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>)),
  244:         timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  245: 
  246:         assert_counter(Errors + 1, xmppErrorMessage)
  247: 
  248:         end).
  249: 
  250: error_presence(Config) ->
  251:     {value, Errors} = get_counter_value(xmppErrorPresence),
  252:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  253: 
  254:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>)),
  255:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  256: 
  257:         ErrorElt = escalus_stanza:error_element(<<"cancel">>, <<"gone">>),
  258:         Presence = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"error">>, ErrorElt),
  259:         escalus:send(Bob, Presence),
  260:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  261: 
  262:         assert_counter(Errors + 1, xmppErrorPresence)
  263: 
  264:         end).
  265: 
  266: error_iq(Config) ->
  267:     {value, Errors} = get_counter_value(xmppErrorIq),
  268: 
  269:     Alice = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(alice),
  270:     escalus_users:create_user(Config, Alice),
  271: 
  272:     timer:sleep(?WAIT_TIME),
  273: 
  274:     assert_counter(Errors + 1, xmppErrorIq).
